sentences.sContent: No person shall prior to leaving the paid area fail or refuse to pay any fare surcharge or other sum leviable in accordance with these by-laws .
sentences.sContent_eng: No person shall prior to leaving the paid area fail or refuse to pay any fare surcharge or other sum leviable in accordance with these by-laws .
sentences.sCn: 任何人不得在未付或拒付按照本附例可征收的任何车费、附加费或其它款项情况下离开已付车费区域。

phrases.pCn: 燃油附加费；燃油费；燃油特别付加运赁

remMethod.val: sur (超过) + charge (收费) → 额外收费

trans.tranOther: to make someone pay an additional amount of money
money that you have to pay in addition to the basic price of something
